All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Applicant
Represents an Applicant in the BTO system.
ApplicantMenu
CLI menu for Applicants per the assignment: - View available projects - Apply for one project - View application status - Request withdrawal - Manage enquiries
Application
Represents an Applicant’s BTO application.
ApplicationStatus
 
AuthenticationException
Thrown when login credentials are invalid.
CsvProjectRepository
A CSV‐backed implementation of ProjectRepository.
CsvUserRepository
CSV‐based implementation, delegating to your existing UserFileHandler.
Enquiry
Represents a project enquiry submitted by an applicant.
EnquiryStatus
 
Filter
Holds criteria for filtering Applicants and Projects (or Applications).
FlatType
 
HDBManager
Represents an HDB Manager who can: - create/update/delete projects (one per period) - toggle project visibility - view all or their own projects - approve/reject officer registrations (respecting slot limits) - approve/reject BTO applications - process withdrawal requests - generate a flat‐booking report
HDBManagerMenu
CLI menu for HDB Manager role.
HDBOfficer
Represents an HDB Officer.
HDBOfficerMenu
CLI menu for HDB Officer.
InMemoryOfficerRegistrationRepository
Simple in‐memory implementation of OfficerRegistrationRepository.
LoginHandler
Handles authentication of users by NRIC/password.
Main
 
MainMenu
Top-level CLI menu.
MaritalStatus
 
Menu
Base class for all CLI menus.
OfficerData
 
OfficerRegistration
 
OfficerRegistrationRepository
Repository abstraction for managing OfficerRegistration entities.
Project
Represents a Build-To-Order (BTO) project listing.
ProjectRepository
Repository abstraction for Projects.
Receipt
A plain-text receipt for a successful flat booking.
RegistrationStatus
 
Report
Generates a booking report of all successful flat bookings, with optional filtering by applicant/project criteria.
User
Represents a user in the system.
UserFileHandler
Handles loading and saving of User data from/to a CSV text file.
UserRepository
Repository abstraction for loading/saving Users.
